title: Vertical length of copper wire in magnetic field

content.question: A vertical length of copper wire moves to the right with a steady velocity v in the direction of a constant horizontal magnetic field B, as shown above. Which of the following describes the induced charges on the ends of the wire?

choices.label:
Top End: Positive
Bottom End: Negative

Top End: Negative
Bottom End: Positive

Top End: Negative
Bottom End: Zero

Top End: Zero
Bottom End: Negative

Top End: Zero
Bottom End: Zero

content.answer:
Top End: Zero
Bottom End: Zero

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
